Posts.Content: sammycat wrote: hi iv found dimpling or puckering in my left breast and its worring the hell out of me iv seen the consulant and had a mamogram which found nothing but the dimpling has got worse so they are now sending me for a mri scan as they are confused there is no lump im very confused too and wondered if anyone else has had this and any body can help me figure out what is going on??????????? Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: found dimpling sammycat JJG

Posts.Content: Jun 5, 2010 04:18PM sammycat wrote: Thanks for your reply iv got my MRI on the 22nd June which is a little wait but at least im getting looked at at the Royal Marsden Surrey I was ment to wait till October this year to have another Mamogram however i noticed that the dimpling have got a bit bigger and another line has appeared very faint but i know its there I try not to keep looking at it but can't help it I know there is nothing i can do about it until after the MRI and follow up appointment on the 29th but its seems so far away and feel sick in the stomach while waiting.
Posts.Title: found dimpling sammycat JJG

Posts.Content: Jun 7, 2010 07:20AM sammycat wrote: Hi JJg sorry to hear that your in this situation too its a nightmare it really is. Im 39 and have two kids 7 and 3 both girls and wish this would just go away! However Im looking at it more postive at the moment I did press my consultant at my original appointment back in april when I had a mamogram but they at the time suggested a ultra sound too, but if they dont, request it as you are concerned. This however still did not show up anything but it has left my consultant baffled why i have no lump/mass under neath the skin where the dimples are.She then suggested i have another mamogram is 6 months time but if anything changes i should call and make a appointment earier Within 3 weeks of the original appointment i did notice small changes and a further 2 lines have appeared very faint but i know they are there, I called and was saw straight away She is still confused by this and said she think now it was time for a MRI hopefully this will give me the all clear or pick up something that is not right either way its a good MOT on my breast, I have large breast too and at the time thought it could be where i am a more fuller person however the right breast has not changed shape or have any such lines so have ruled that out. Its always better to be safe than sorry and Im a true beliver of if you dont ask something you wont get it.  So if your not happy with your results and want further test done then ask and mention my case. Take care and good luck please let me know how you get on x
Posts.Title: found dimpling sammycat JJG
